text: People with red hair are referred to as redheads. Natural redheads often have very light colored skin. They often also have freckles. == Examples of redheads == *Amy Adams *Andrew Jackson *Antonio Vivaldi *Axl Rose *Benedict Cumberbatch *Boris Becker *Christopher Columbus *Calvin Coolidge *Chuck Norris *Cleopatra *Conan O'Brien *Seth Green *David Bowie *David Caruso *D.H. title: Red hair
